评论详情: This dress is everything! The A-line flare is incredibly flattering, especially at the hips—even if you don’t naturally have curves, this dress creates the illusion effortlessly. The crisp, bright white color is stunning, and the material is soft, comfortable, and has just a bit of stretch.  That said, the bust area isn’t super generous, so if you’re fuller up top (I’m a 36DD), expect some side boob action. Not a dealbreaker, but something to keep in mind when choosing undergarments.  What I love most is how versatile this dress is. I wore it for: ✨ My birthday High Tea at the St. Regis in DC ✨ A rooftop dinner date in Raleigh, NC ✨ A work conference in Houston, TX (Afrotech)—styled with stockings and a blazer for a more professional look  I’d describe it as a conservative mini—it’s near fingertip length per “school standards,” making it classy but still fun. You can dress it up or down, even layering it with a blouse for a long-sleeved, office-appropriate vibe.  Final verdict? Buy it! (in every color) This is one of those pieces you’ll reach for over and over again.

评论概述: Perfect for the ladies with big hips

Our work is for a Christmas party and it was perfect! I got a lot of compliments. The fabric felt good. Not see-through. Beautiful color, super classy. I am personally hit or miss with the sizes between small and extra small. If they had an extra small, it would’ve been better for me. Overall, it does run to size.

评论详情: This dress is super cute! It mimics some higher end dresses of the same style, but of course material is likely a bit lesser quality. You really wouldn’t know though! I’m always unsure of ordering clothes on amazon, but this really is truly adorable and super flattering. can even be worn without a bra without sagging due to a slight support line under busy area. Length is awesome. Runs a little big. I ordered a medium ams returned to exchange for a small. 5’ 4” athletic, 129-130 pounds.
Received so many compliments! Highly recommend! Black was not see through and an appropriate length. Everyone needs to own a LBD

La tela del vestido es de muy mala calidad VS el precio muy alto. No recomiendo la compra.

My daughter was like a doll in the dress. Everything she's using was bought on Amazon. The dress adapts to your body and looks very beautiful. It came in the perfect size, perfect cut, perfect finish and excellent quality. Congratulations 🍾🎉
The dress is absolutely gorgeous. I purchased a size small. The shoulder part was a little big but nothing to bother me. I wore it to my Christmas family photoshoot. Received so many compliments!

This dress was great for a formal/semi formal event. A little snug on the breast, and if your more well endowed the top can be a little annoying but it’s not bad. The dress gives body, and this photo is after I drank and ate.

The fit was true to size. It was very comfortable. The material was good not to thin. Since it is backless if you have a larger top you might want to wear a backless bra. It was a great value and I will wear it again.

Honestly, I was nervous to get this product but I am glad I did. I am 5'1 110 pounds and the small fit perfectly. The material is pretty thick and does not look cheap either. The sides do puff out a bit which looks a little weird, but I steamed the edges flat and now it falls better (not perfect but much better). I say it is def worth it for the price! Graduation dress approved.
Obsessed with this dress. It fits perfect and the fabric is so comfortable.

Sometimes less is MORE.  I purchased this dress for my teenage daughter to wear to a banquet.  This dress was a perfect fit, size S-M, 5”5, 115lbs.  We paired it with a basic shrug (to cover the opening in the back)black tights, & shoes (see picture), and she loved it. The dress is made with good quality fabric, soft and worth the price.

Bought this dress for a trip. Although the dress fit throughout the body, if you’re a busty gal, it may create a small back bulge above the zipper. Simple dress, that is a quality material and not sheer. I typically  wear a size 12 and am 5’6, 38DD.
It’s cute dress, looks just like the picture. Only downfall is it is a little sheer so you need some kind of half slip under. A regular girdle won’t work because of the open back

The material of this dress is thick and allows movement. It looks gorgeous. I am 5'4", 145lbs. This dress showed half  my butt without me having to really bend over. The medium was way tooo short on the back. I will return it and get a large to see if it helps with the lenth.

评论概述: Amazing but beware colors differ in quality!
评论详情: I ordered this in white and loved it. Decent quality. I’m 5 feet tall, 150lbs. I ordered a large. Fit great in the chest and stomach but was a little long. I just hemmed it and it worked great. I loved it so much I then ordered it in black. Immediately upon taking it out of the bag I noticed the difference in fabric. The black one was cheap feeling and looking. The fit wasn’t the same. Awful quality and fit compared to the white. Kept the white, returning the black.
This dress was amazing very true to size so fit was great for me, a lil bit see through so be careful, really nice material it looks rich….
